Class RandomStrategy

java.lang.Object
org.com.Strategies.RandomStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Strategy
public class RandomStrategy extends Object implements Strategy, Serializable
The `RandomStrategy` class represents a strategy where actions are chosen randomly. This class implements the `Strategy` interface and is `Serializable` for potential persistence. Author: Arvind Lakshmanan
See Also:

      public RandomStrategy()

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public List<String> createOrder(GamePhaseHandler p_gamePhaseHandler, Player p_currentPlayer)
      Creates an order for the random strategy during the game phase. This method randomly decides the player's actions, such as deploying armies, executing cards, advancing armies, or committing the turn.
      Specified by:
      createOrder in interface Strategy
      Parameters:
      p_gamePhaseHandler - The handler for the current game phase.
      p_currentPlayer - The player for whom the order is being created.
      Returns:
      A list of strings representing the generated order, or null if no order is created.

    • generateCardOrder

      public String generateCardOrder(GamePhaseHandler p_gameManager, Player p_currentPlayer, String p_prioritizeCard)
      Generates a card order for the random strategy. This method randomly selects a card from the player's available cards and generates an order based on the card type. If a prioritized card is specified, it attempts to use that card first.
      Specified by:
      generateCardOrder in interface Strategy
      Parameters:
      p_gameManager - The handler for the current game phase.
      p_currentPlayer - The player for whom the card order is being generated.
      p_prioritizeCard - The card type to prioritize, or null for random selection.
      Returns:
      A string representing the generated card order, or null if no valid order is created.

    • getNeighbour

      public Country getNeighbour(Country p_country, Map p_gameMap, Player p_currentPlayer)
      Retrieves a random neighboring country of the specified country. This method iterates through the neighboring country IDs of the given country, adds valid neighboring countries to a list, and randomly selects one from the list.
      Specified by:
      getNeighbour in interface Strategy
      Parameters:
      p_country - The country for which a neighbor is to be retrieved.
      p_gameMap - The game map containing all countries and their connections.
      p_currentPlayer - The current player executing the strategy.
      Returns:
      A randomly selected neighboring country, or null if no neighbors are found.
